0100100100110010 1101000001010011 0 -> sum: 0001100110000101, cout: 1
0010010101111010 0010111101101000 1 -> sum: 0101010011100011, cout: 0

0101001000010101 1100111111100110 1 -> sum: 0010000111111100, cout: 1
1000100111010111 1110100011111000 1 -> sum: 0111001011010000, cout: 1
1101011111011010 1110101110100010 0 -> sum: 1100001101111100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
